WRITING.TITLE: Any other Vietnam war games that you would recomend?
WRITING.TEXT: I`m one of the ufortunate souls who hasn`t recieved a beta code. and thought it would be a good idea to start a threat about other Vietnam war games that are out there. I already know a few, like Bf vietnam and BC2 Vietnam, and of course black ops 1. Are there any other Vietnam war games out there that you would recomend?

WRITING.TITLE: WW2 and other strategy games to play while we wait!
WRITING.TEXT:
Hello all. I am sure you are just as hyped for Steel Division - Normandy 44 as I am, and the purpose of this thread is to make a list of other ww2 rts games that are worth playing and than can help us get through the long wait before Steel division releases.
Some games I would recomend: The company of heroes series. The blitzkrieg series (Haven`t played the third yet) Men of war franchise. Gates of hell (similar to men of war? Soldiers: Arena (Remake of Soliders: heroes of ww2, which was the progenitor of the men of war series) Sudden strike 4
i know there are other badass rts games out there, but At first i Think a list of ww2 games would do.
Yes.
Could be used for ressuply duties, carry weapons across the map and a few soldiers. And the kilobri could be used as a recon/scout.
There isn`t very much informaation about them, but some of the helicopters entered service in 1941/42, so thye might very well have been used in the west front in 1944.
I would love to see the helicopters. They never get anny love in ww2 rts games.
They wre actually build and used during ww2.
AH, too bad. I would love some helicopters and unique units-
They should be very limited in suply and have to be used at the correct time, but I would love it. No ww2 games ever include these unique weapons.
